page.title: 14Art & Craft
page.content: TWO MILES NORTH OF ACHNAMARA VILLAGE IS KNAP STUDIO COTTAGE BY THE LOCH.IT IS WHITE WASHED STONE AND IS 200 YEARS OLD.A LADY BORN IN EDINBURGH AND AN ARTIST FOR 50 YEARS HAS LIVED IN IT FOR 20 YEARS.THE STUDIO IS 15 YEARS OLD. MOST MORNINGS SHE DOES CRAFT WORK WHICH INCLUDES SLATE ENGRAVING,GLASS PANELS AND STONE FIGURES. IN THE EVENINGS SHE LIKES TO PAINT WITH WATER COLOURS.HER FAVOURITE SUBJECTS ARE MYTHS AND LEGENDS. SHE ALSO PAINTS VIEWS FROM SKETCHES DRAWN OUT DOORS.THE FIRST PAINTING SHE SOLD WAS OF ST COLUMBA.AN AVERAGE SIZE IS 10"BY14"AND WOULD COST APPROX Â£35.TOURISTS FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD BUY THESE.SHE SELLS APPROX 50 PAINTINGS A YEAR. HER OTHER HOBBIES ARE READING, WRITING & GARDENING.
